Package Helper

Class ScheduledDeparturesFilter

java.lang.Object
Helper.ScheduledDeparturesFilter
public class ScheduledDeparturesFilter extends Object
Creates object that serves as parameters that filters API call dataset. Essential in GUI FlightSearchFrame using "Depart From", "Arrive to", and "Date" forms. This object is used for FlightModel class.

Since:
04/17/2023
Author:
Carlos Figueroa

Explanation of important functions: Constructor creates parameters that will filter large dataset from Api call. SetDepartureDateAPI(String departureDate) converts date given by user in FlightSearchFrame from Date format to a String format that is used as a parameter in the api call.

Important data structure in class/important methods in class:

  • ScheduledDeparturesFilter(String airportDepartureCode, String airportArrivalCode, String departureDate)
  • getAirportDepartureCode()
  • getAirportArrivalCode()
  • getDepartureDate()
  • getDepartureDateAPI()
  • setAirportDepartureCode(String airportDepartureCode)
  • setAirportArrivalCode(String airportDepartureCode)
  • setDepartureDate(String departureDate)
  • setDepartureDateAPI(String departureDate)

Any algorithms used?

    • setDepartureDateAPI

      public void setDepartureDateAPI(String departureDate)
      Method converts date given by user in FlightSearchFrame from Date format to a String format that is used as a parameter in the api call. When making api request for returning flight, simply replace parameter departureDate to returnDate.
      Parameters:
      departureDate - departureDate
